title: poseMetadata
description: Schema for storing metadata about pose file in Yogis

name.description: Original pose name in Sanskrit or English

level.description: Level of difficulty for the pose, e.g., beginner, intermediate, advanced

category.description: Category of the pose, e.g., standing, seated, supine, inverted

duration.description: Recommended duration in seconds for holding the pose

repetitions.description: Recommended number of repetitions for the pose

description.description: Detailed description of the pose, including benefits and instructions

notes.description: Additional notes or tips for performing the pose

image.description: URL or path to an image representing the pose
